long_description: Look and feel great when you hike-wear the Kuhl Infinite Shirt for women. The polyester fabric in a fun plaid blocks sun, wicks moisture and dries fast. 100% polyester features light stretch and an odor-resistant finish. Kuhl Infinite shirt offers UPF 30 sun protection. Nice touches include gathers at the back yoke, button-tab details, and 2 welt-style chest pockets.
short_description: Look and feel great when you hike-wear the Kuhl Infinite Shirt for women. The polyester fabric in a fun plaid blocks sun, wicks moisture and dries fast.
